Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends certain provisions relating to additional sales tax imposed by the city of Yonkers
Summary: Extends certain provisions relating to additional sales tax imposed by the city of Yonkers.
LawCode: Amd ยง1210, Tax L; amd ยง7, Chap 67 of 2015
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the city of Yonkers to impose additional sales tax; and to amend chapter 67 of the laws of 2015, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the city of Yonkers to impose additional sales tax, in relation to extending provisions relating thereto
